meanings.def: a person whose job involves examining facts or materials in order to give an opinion on them
examples: He's a senior research analyst at Deutsche Bank.
City analysts forecast huge profits this year.
according to an analyst According to music industry analysts, music downloads are set to decline by as much as 30 per cent this year.
She's an investment analyst with a big City firm.
This view is backed up by several independent political analysts in Washington.

meanings.def: a person who treats patients using psychoanalysis
